document_data.name: Krolla
document_data.mainbody:
'''Krolla''' was a [[goblin]] that dwelled within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|We already got the greatest art there is â€“ and it ain't no warbling. It's ''chicken-chasin'''.}}
document_data.Description: Like other faithful of [[the Absolute]], Krolla was branded with a [[mark of the Absolute|mark]] given to her by Priestess [[Gut]].
document_data.Activities:
Krolla enjoyed and possibly invented the sadistic game of [[chicken]]-chasin', during which a player would have to chase a chicken through a hazardous obstacle course towards a set of goalposts. She would regularly bet on the outcomes of the games and resorted to cheating to ensure her winnings if necessary.

Interestingly enough, she did not the know the difference between an [[owlbear]] cub and an oversized chicken.
document_data.History: She was present at the Shattered Sanctum during her camp's grand celebration following the immensely successful raid on [[Waukeen's Rest]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
